[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: from_delete_resource()] [GUID Preservation] Is copying last_guid_creation_num from previous_object to the deletion record secure, or can this be exploited to reuse GUID values? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: from_delete_resource()] [allow_ungated_transfer Preservation] Does preserving allow_ungated_transfer in the deletion record create vulnerabilities where deleted objects appear transferable? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: from_delete_resource()] [State Key Hash Validation] Is state_key_hash validated when creating the deletion record, or can mismatched hashes cause lookup failures? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: from_delete_resource()] [Placeholder Value Security] Are the placeholder 0 values passed to MoveResource::from_delete_resource() safe, or can they cause incorrect resource address derivation? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: from_delete_resource()] [Resource Address Mismatch] Can resource.address differ from the actual object being deleted, causing deletion records to point to wrong addresses? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: get_object_owner()] [Race Condition] Can an attacker exploit the retry loop to cause the function to return stale object owner data by timing ownership transfers during the retry window? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: get_object_owner()] [Retry Logic Vulnerability] Can database connection issues cause the function to retry with different connection states, returning inconsistent results across retries? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: get_object_owner()] [Sleep Timing Attack] Is the QUERY_RETRY_DELAY_MS value configurable by attackers, or can it be exploited to cause predictable retry timing? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: get_object_owner()] [Error Suppression] Does the function suppress all database errors in the Err(_) match arm, potentially hiding SQL injection attempts or other attacks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: get_object_owner()] [Thread Sleep Security] Can the std::thread::sleep() call be interrupted or manipulated to affect retry timing and cause race conditions? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: get_object_owner()] [Retry Count Security] Is QUERY_RETRIES properly bounded to prevent excessive retries, or can it be configured to values that cause DoS conditions? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: get_object_owner()] [Connection Pool Exhaustion] Can repeated failures exhaust the PgPoolConnection, causing legitimate queries to fail? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: get_object_owner()] [Query Result Consistency] Does CurrentObjectQuery::get_by_address() guarantee consistent reads, or can intermediate commits cause the function to return partially updated object data? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: get_object_owner()] [struct Field Mapping] When mapping CurrentObjectQuery to CurrentObject, can field mismatches or missing validations cause data corruption? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: get_object_owner()] [is_deleted Flag Handling] Can the function return objects marked as is_deleted=true, causing deleted objects to be used as 'previous' state for new operations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: get_object_owner()] [BigDecimal Conversion] Are there precision or overflow issues when converting last_guid_creation_num from the database query result? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: get_object_owner()] [Comment Warning] The comment states 'This is actually not great because object owner can change'—what specific attack vectors does this enable? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: get_object_owner()] [Error Message Security] Does the anyhow::anyhow! error message leak sensitive information about database structure or object addresses? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/v2_objects.rs] [Function: get_object_owner()] [Address Parameter Validation] Is object_address validated before being passed to the database query, or can injection attacks occur? (High)
